lead_paragraph: Liverpool outcast Mamadou Sakho took to social media on Saturday to say he will expose "the lie" about his situation at the club.

headline.print_headline: Liverpool's Sakho Courts Controversy With Snapchat Outburst
headline.main: Liverpool's Sakho Courts Controversy With Snapchat Outburst

snippet: Liverpool outcast Mamadou Sakho took to social media on Saturday to say he will expose "the lie" about his situation at the club....
